mapper.sql: A.MST_AP_NO, A.PO_NO, A.ORDER_NO, A.ORDER_ITEM, A.OS_ID, A.UNIT_PRICE, A.APP_QTY, A.AP_QTY, A.REAL_AP_QTY, A.TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT, A.BUSINESS_TAX, A.CR_USER, A.CR_TIME, A.MD_USER, A.MD_TIME, A.TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT + A.BUSINESS_TAX AP_AMT, B.SUBPOENA_DATE, D.VOUCHER_DATE, D.VOUCHER_NBR, E.ITEM_NAME ORDER_ITEM_DESC
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE_DTL A left join TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE B on B.AP_NO = A.MST_AP_NO and B.PO_NO = A.PO_NO left join TB_PAY_VOUCHER_CREDIT C on C.CASH_REQ_AP_NO = B.AP_NO and C.CONTRACT_PO_NO = B.PO_NO left join TB_PAY_PAYMENT_REQUEST_VOUCHER D on D.SEQ_NBR = C.MST_SEQ_NBR left join TB_COM_ITEM_MAIN E on E.ITEM_ID = A.ORDER_ITEM
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE_DTL (MST_AP_NO, PO_NO, ORDER_NO, ORDER_ITEM, OS_ID, UNIT_PRICE, APP_QTY, AP_QTY, REAL_AP_QTY, TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT, BUSINESS_TAX, CR_USER, CR_TIME, MD_USER, MD_TIME ) values (#{MST_AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PO_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ORDER_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ORDER_ITEM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UNIT_PRICE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{APP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{AP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{REAL_AP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{BUSINESS_TAX,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE_DTL
MST_AP_NO,
PO_NO,
ORDER_NO,
ORDER_ITEM,
OS_ID,
UNIT_PRICE,
APP_QTY,
AP_QTY,
REAL_AP_QTY,
TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT,
BUSINESS_TAX,
CR_USER,
CR_TIME,
MD_USER,
MD_TIME,

mapper.update:
update TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE_DTL
MST_AP_NO = #{record.MST_AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PO_NO = #{record.PO_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{record.ORDER_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ITEM = #{record.ORDER_ITEM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OS_ID = #{record.OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_PRICE = #{record.UNIT_PRICE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APP_QTY = #{record.APP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AP_QTY = #{record.AP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REAL_AP_QTY = #{record.REAL_AP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT = #{record.TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUSINESS_TAX = #{record.BUSINESS_TAX,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CR_USER = #{record.CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CR_TIME = #{record.CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MD_USER = #{record.MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MD_TIME = #{record.MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update TB_PAY_OUTSOURCE_ACCEPTANCE_DTL set MST_AP_NO = #{record.MST_AP_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PO_NO = #{record.PO_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NO = #{record.ORDER_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ITEM = #{record.ORDER_ITEM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OS_ID = #{record.OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_PRICE = #{record.UNIT_PRICE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APP_QTY = #{record.APP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AP_QTY = #{record.AP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REAL_AP_QTY = #{record.REAL_AP_QTY,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT = #{record.TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUSINESS_TAX = #{record.BUSINESS_TAX,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CR_USER = #{record.CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_TIME = #{record.CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MD_USER = #{record.MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MD_TIME = #{record.MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
